description: Mô tả công việc

Job Overview
The PAVE Infrastructure Engineer will be primarily responsible for managing and maintaining the PAVE infrastructure, ensuring the delivery of secure and high-quality services. This role involves collaborating with engineers, enhancing infrastructure tools, and implementing upgrades as needed. A key responsibility is to protect PAVE from cybersecurity threats by performing vulnerability assessments, deploying security measures, and managing risk.

Job Overview
Responsibilities

Mainly responsible for the PAVE Infrastructure and collaborate with other engineers to develop and deliver secured and qualified services
Monitor and execute required upgrades to all tools related to the IT infrastructure
Ensuring PAVE is safe and secure against cybersecurity threats
Identifying and deploying cybersecurity measures by continuously performing vulnerability assessments and risk management
Developing Incidence management reports and root cause analysis
Monitoring security processes during their entire lifecycle to ensure adherence to policies and updating or creating new processes to improve or minimize wastage
Have the technical skills to review, verify, and validate the software code developed in the project
Have the knowledge in a least one of the following programming languages: Golang, Python, Javascript, PHP, to support the development of related PAVE services
Support IT Manager with documenting and executing required licenses/ certification such as ISO, SOC2, ITGC.

description: Mô tả công việc
ABOUT US:
ABOUT US:

Brighton Investments is a dynamic and forward-thinking organization committed to driving innovation and excellence across a diverse portfolio of companies. With a focus on premium consumer goods retail, healthcare, and technology, we are dedicated to delivering exceptional value and sustainable growth. Our mission is to Enrich Vietnamese people live’s with Knowledge, Trust and Finest Experiences. We foster a modern, data-driven and technology – oriented work culture that encourages creativity and collaboration.

As part of our strategic vision, we are establishing a new technology hub to provide cutting-edge technology solutions and services to all our member companies. This hub will foster innovation, collaboration and continuous improvement, ensuring we stay ahead in the digital landscape.

This technology hub is a distinct entity, playing a central role in shaping our group’s digital initiatives. It collaborates with and supports all our business units, from retail to finance, enhancing our overall technological capabilities.
YOUR ROLE:
YOUR ROLE:

As a DevOps Engineer, you’ll be at the forefront of this exciting venture, collaborating with teams across the group to build, maintain, and optimize critical systems and infrastructure. Your work will directly impact the success of multiply businesses, offering a unique opportunity to gain broad exposure and make a significant contribution.

We’re targeting to have a light-weighted and flexible technology environment by emphasizing the presence of cloud-based systems so a big portion of your responsibilities will be supported by relevant 3rd-party solution providers.
